titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of October 2023 as "National Down Syndrome Awareness Month".
A resolution expressing support for the designation of October 2023 as "National Down Syndrome Awareness Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of October 2023 as National Down Syndrome Awareness Month.
